title: Boxing kangaroo lee sin!
body:
Hey guys! 
So there has been much debating about the new OCE server skin, about how it barely represents us and that... Anyway, I thought of a new skin! 
{{champion:64}} kangaroo lee sin!!! Picture it! Lee sin wearing a kangaroo onesie, throwing wallabies for his q, doing a "Kangaroo jump" for his ult.
The creativity is endless! 


Thoughts?

replies.body: TBH. The current OCE skin does a fairly decent way of representing all populations in the Oceanic server. A "kangaroo lee sin" would really only cater to the Australian population. One of the biggest reasons for the delay in our server skin was finding a way to represent as many if not all population groups within the Oceanic server. In addition, Lee Sin already has a boxing skin.

Kangaroo Lee Sin only represents Australia since they only appear in AUstralia, the Cosmic Reaver Kassadin is a good representative because only the Southern Cross me Seen in Oceania and nowhere else, if you are considering a skin concept please think of all the other countries in Oceania.
SilentXKiller
do you not wont a free skin shhhhhhh o wait no free skin fuck you riot
